properties.displayName: UniFi Site Manager - Controller Connection State Change
properties.description: Detects when a UniFi controller (Cloud Key, Dream Machine, etc.) experiences a connection state change. This could indicate network issues, power problems, or controller failures that may impact network management capabilities.
properties.query:
// UniFi Controller Connection State Change Detection
// Author: Fetch Labs (https://sentinel.blog)
UniFiSiteManager_Hosts_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
| where isnotempty(lastConnectionStateChange)
| extend ConnectionChange = todatetime(lastConnectionStateChange)
| where ConnectionChange > ago(1h)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by id
| extend 
    HostTypeDisplay = case(
        hostType == "ucore", "UniFi OS Console",
        hostType == "uck", "Cloud Key",
        hostType == "uckp", "Cloud Key+",
        hostType == "udm", "Dream Machine",
        hostType == "udmpro", "Dream Machine Pro",
        hostType == "udmse", "Dream Machine SE",
        hostType == "self-hosted", "Self-Hosted",
        hostType
    )
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ConnectionChangeTime = ConnectionChange,
    HostId = id,
    HostType = hostType,
    HostTypeDisplay,
    IPAddress = ipAddress,
    IsBlocked = isBlocked,
    IsOwner = owner

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: A {{HostTypeDisplay}} controller at {{IPAddress}} experienced a connection state change.
